title: WhatsApp notification sound doesn't stop unless I restart the device.
content: Google pixel 3xl Anorid 11. i having one issue since a long time. whenever I am get notification from Whatsapp message received, the ring does not stop until I restart the device. this happens only my phone is connected with earphone. I have tried even force stop to the Whatsapp app but only stopped after restarting of phone. Is there anyone facing this kind of bugs and can suggest me how to get rids of. its really irritating.
